title: Best price/value near Times Square
text: The 414 Hotel offers a great prive/value place to stay near Times Square in New York City. It is a small hotel (22 rooms) so make your reservations early for prime travel dates-like Christmas time in NYC .Location, location, location! Next to Restaurant Row, a few blocks from Times Square and Radio City Music Hall to name a few nearby places to visit. The rooms are a nice size and clean. It may not be the Ritz but for the price it can not be beat! The staff is great-they go out tof their way to make your stay with them memorable. For NYC-this is a don't miss..............................
